## Properties

### autogenerated?

> `optional` **autogenerated**: `boolean`

Defined in: [packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts:1349](https://github.com/Sitecore/marketplace-sdk/blob/main/packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts#L1349)

Example value: True

***

### rootPath?

> `optional` **rootPath**: `string` \| `null`

Defined in: [packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts:1344](https://github.com/Sitecore/marketplace-sdk/blob/main/packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts#L1344)

***

### url?

> `optional` **url**: `string` \| `null`

Defined in: [packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts:1339](https://github.com/Sitecore/marketplace-sdk/blob/main/packages/xmc/src/client-sites/types.gen.ts#L1339)
